text: (upbeat music)
- I'm Amurag Vermuri,
software development manager in AWS.
(upbeat music)

My team built an exciting new
service called Audit Manager,

and it is there to help
customers manage their compliance
and audit requirements on the AWS cloud.
(upbeat music)
At AWS, I've seen very motivated folks,

who are always ready to jump
into very challenging problems,
and they're excited to solve them.

There's a lot to learn,
from anyone I work with,
and I also applied my learnings,
and it is well-received by customers.

So I find a lot of job
satisfaction at work.

I started with software
development for Amazon in India.
I was working for the advertising team,
and I spent three years there.
After that, I spent some time

in retail pricing team and
also for the Alexa team.
That experience made me what I am today
and with that knowledge,
I'm able to lead with the team at AWS.
(upbeat music)
On the team right now, we get to work
with the latest of latest technologies.

I could call them
cutting-edge technologies,
and they are really necessary.

It's not just a luxury that
we want to work with them

because we want to deliver
the best value for customers,

and we want to be the first
ones on AWS doing that.

So working with the latest
technologies does excite me
and everyone on my team.
(upbeat music)

AWS is a culture where you
find that there are a lot
of smart people, who have built
very highly-scalable technologies,
and there is a lot to grow also.

So for folks who want
to learn something new,

grow along with the team,
deliver something exciting

for customers, I believe
that AWS is the right place.
(upbeat music)
